sentence.Network_en: They're quite brazen about their bisexuality, it doesn't worry them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在自己的双性恋问题上无所顾忌，毫不为意。

sentence.Network_en: She had become brazen about the whole affair.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对整件事已经不感到羞耻了。

sentence.Network_en: The brazen woman laughed loudly at the judge who sentenced her.
sentence.Network_cn: 那无耻的女子冲着给她判刑的法官高声大笑.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... messer n. 混乱, 脏乱v.弄乱 brazen adj. 黄铜制的, 厚颜无耻的 beckoned v. 招手, 召唤.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... brawny adj． （人）强壮的 brazen adj． 无耻的，厚脸皮的 breach v． 毁坏，泄密 n．缺口.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... bravura ? n. 出色的表演 brazen ? adj. 厚颜无耻的 breach ? v. 使破裂, 破坏.
Character  -... ... 无成[ achieve nothing] 无耻[ cheekiness;brazen;impudent;shameless] 无道[ brutal;cruel;tyrannical].

list.abs: 远古时代折磨人的5种方法尖叫铜牛(brazen bull)，这就是把人扔进巨大的中空铜牛中，然后用火烧铜牛，受害者会在铜牛里慢慢被蒸 …
braze 铜焊brazen out 厚着脸对待brazen 黄铜制的

jx.jx_en_mean: endure an embarrassing or difficult situation by behaving with apparent confidence and lack of shame

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bræsen 'made of brass', from bræs 'bras', of unknown ultimate origin

entry.tran: 无所顾忌的；肆无忌惮的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as brazen, you mean that they are very bold and do not care what other people think about them or their behaviour.

example.ex: They're quite brazen about their bisexuality, it doesn't worry them.
example.tran: 他们在自己的双性恋问题上无所顾忌，毫不为意。

sentences.sentence: "the most bodacious display of tourism this side of Anaheim"- Los Angeles Times
"the modern world with its quick material successes and insolent belief in the boundless possibilities of progress"- Bertrand Russell

means.word_mean: 2. made of or resembling brass (as in color or hardness)

sentences.en: The brazen woman laughed loudly at the judge who sentenced her.
sentences.cn: 那无耻的女子冲着给她判刑的法官高声大笑。

sentences.en: They showed a brazen disregard for her privacy.
sentences.cn: 他们明目张胆地无视她的隐私权。

sentences.en: The senator ↗brazened it out↙ as the list of scandals grew.
sentences.cn: 丑闻不断出现，这位参议员依然若无其事。
